title: 1.9预发布第二版己经发布了!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
author: rickky2
txt_content:
本帖最后由 rickky2 于 2011-9-29 23:58 编辑 

1.9pre2
http://assets.minecraft.net/1_9-pre2/minecraft.jar
不能翻的这边
http://115.com/file/cl1lfgvv#

1.9pre2服务端
http://assets.minecraft.net/1_9-pre2/minecraft_server.jar
不能翻的这边
http://115.com/file/cl1ljg19#




EqRcX.png (144.67 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2011-9-29 21:46 上传





1.9pre2更新详细(翻译)
Nine new music discs (11 in total, one "broken")九张新的光盘
Blaze powder 火焰粉(两个粉可以用来制作火焰棒，将来用在药水上面,也可能用在熔炉上)
Magma cream 岩浆霜 (用处:制作火焰粉和史莱姆球)
Glass bottle  玻璃瓶 (将来可以制作药水)
Spider eye (dropped by spiders) and fermented spider eye 蜘蛛的眼睛(杀蜘蛛会掉),发酵的蜘蛛眼睛
Hardcore mode: game over when you die, hearts have new icons 新的hc模式，死了地图就会被删掉
Golden apple now has a shining animation 吃金苹果有新的动画
Pressure plates on top of fence posts now make sound when you walk on them or next to them 放在木栏上面的踏板现在你走过去会有声音
Villagers has no names (No more TESTIFICATE) NPC村民删除TESTIFICATE这个名字
Holding the spacebar allows you to jump continuously again 按住空格连续跳回来
The enderman pearls now teleports you when thrown 当你抛出黑基珍珠会把你传送
Endermen teleport to dodge arrows. Endermen teleport out of water when they touch it. Endermen teleport a lot more 黑基能闪开弓箭,当他碰到水会被传走，还有更多更多
Item repair! Put two damaged items in the crafting grid (arrangement doesn't seem to matter) 物品现在可以修复，将两个损坏的物品放到工作台上
F5 view cycling 按两下F5可以看到你的脸
Fences now attach to adjacent blocks, has an interesting outcome when used certain ways 木栏会把附近的方块连接
Pumpkins can be “crafted” into 4 Pumpkin Seeds 南瓜可以制作4个南爪种子
Zombie Pigmen now randomly drop rotten flesh or gold bits instead of everytime 僵尸和猪人会随机掉落僵尸肉或者黄金粒
F8 cinematic mode is back 鼠标平滑移动回来(F8)
Feed passive mobs wheat to make them breed with each other 养动物可以让它们培育新一代
Passive mobs follow you when wheat is selected 用小麦可以让动物跟着你(应该是可以养它们)

英文很烂，可能有点错误

下一个版本：1.9正式版
